about.title: About Zerofy Foods
about.content: Zerofy Foods LLP is a dynamic health-focused food company committed to delivering clean, wholesome, and indulgence-free snacking options. Rooted in the philosophy of 'Zero Guilt, 100% Nutrition,' we offer thoughtfully curated and minimally processed snacks for modern consumers who seek both taste and health.
about.missionContent: To revolutionize the snacking industry by creating products that fuel your body without compromising on taste or nutrition. We believe in transparency, quality, and the power of natural ingredients.
about.tagline: Crafting healthy snacks that fuel your body and satisfy your taste buds without compromise.

story.title: Our Story
story.content1: Zerofy was born from a simple but powerful belief — good food begins with great ingredients. In a world where most 'healthy' snacks are either over-processed or over-marketed, we felt something essential was missing: purity.
story.content2: A bunch of us — friends, food lovers, and fitness chasers — kept asking the same question: Why is it so hard to find simple, high-quality ingredients you can trust with your eyes closed?
story.content3: We believe that when you start with the right ingredients, clean eating becomes easy. Zerofy is our effort to make foundational foods cleaner, more transparent, and accessible — because your everyday choices shouldn't be a compromise.

pure.title: Only What's Needed
pure.content: 100% pure and unprocessed ingredients sourced directly from farmers. No preservatives, no chemicals, no shortcuts.

transparent.title: Zero Junk, Total Transparency
transparent.content: No hidden sugars, emulsifiers, or flavoring agents. What you see is what you eat - clean, authentic food you can trust.

health.title: Foundational Health
health.content: Core diet essentials that nourish your body with functional nutrition that fuels your day, not slows you down.
